text: The Cupa României Final was the final match of the 2014–15 Cupa României, played between Universitatea Cluj and Steaua București. Steaua București won the match 3–0. == Match == {| width=92% | |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||33 || Robert Veselovsky |- |RB ||13 || Raul Ciupe (c) |- |CB ||24 || Cristian Munteanu |- |CB ||18 || Ionuț Neag |- |LB ||4 || Dino Škvorc || |- |RM||11 || Pablo Ceppelini || || |- |DM||30 || Andrei Lungu |- |DM||27 || Lóránt Kovács || || |- |LM||17 || Petar Jovanović || || |- |FW||24 || Justin Mengolo |- |FW||7 || Vlad Morar |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |RM||16 || Nuno Viveiros || || |- |LM||31 || Narcisse Bambara || || |- |MF||10 || Vasilică Cristocea || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Adrian Falub |} |valign="top"| | style="vertical-align:top;
